title: Riven skins
body: **PLEASE **someone tell me will dragon blade riven come back or champion ship i missed out on dragon blade id love it to come back! let me know if it will :/{{champion:92}}

replies.body:
Hey,
Dragon blade will come back as part of the Lunar Revel. However, Championship is  limited skin and won't be coming back anytime soon. Although, there is a rumour  it will come back in a bundle with the other championship skins. Hope this helped! 

Yours sincerely, 
Talwyn

hmm next year omggggg alright thanks bro patience is key


yours sincerely,
Box box

thanks a lot man! but hasn't the lunar revel already came out?  the caitlyn skin and morg skin ? or is the lunar revel something different ?
**__**

Hey,
It has came out already this year during the Lunar Revel, however it left when the Revel left, so you'll have to wait until next year. The only other option is to obtain it through mystery gifting or hextech crafting. The skin is definitely worth it though. I have every skin but Championship so I am pretty hyped if it becomes available. 

Yours sincerely, 
Talwyn
Isn't champion ship riven only ever supposed to be available through getting 100% right in the worlds tree now
